page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Workshops
page.description: Enhance your Serverless Knowledge by attending a workshop from one of our partners.

workshops.title: Serverlesspresso: Build an event-driven application from the ground up
workshops.description: Discover how to build a complete coffee-ordering serverless web application using services such as AWS Step Functions and Amazon EventBridge and more.

workshops.title: Build your first cloud native website with static web apps and serverless APIs
workshops.description: In this workshop, we'll guide you through a hands-on lab building a website, it's data tier, and the connections between the two.

workshops.title: Generative AI and Large Language Models with Amazon SageMaker
workshops.description: In this workshop, learn how to use Amazon SageMaker and other associated services to build, train, and deploy generative AI models.
